Package com.foreach.across.modules.entity.bind

Class EntityPropertiesBinderController

java.lang.Object
com.foreach.across.modules.entity.bind.EntityPropertiesBinderController
public final class EntityPropertiesBinderController extends Object
Controller for an EntityPropertiesBinder which will perform EntityPropertyController actions on the individual properties present. Callbacks can be registered for the related actions that should be peformed on the actual entity, and those callbacks will execute after any EntityPropertyController.BEFORE_ENTITY but before any EntityPropertyController.AFTER_ENTITY methods.

Can be used to validate the properties of a binder, as well as save the modified values.

Since:
3.2.0
Author:
Arne Vandamme

  • Method Details

    • addEntityValidationCallback

      public EntityPropertiesBinderController addEntityValidationCallback(Runnable... callback)
      Add one or more callbacks that should be called whenever the entity validation should happen. These will get executed in their registration order, after EntityPropertyController.BEFORE_ENTITY, but before EntityPropertyController.AFTER_ENTITY.
      Parameters:
      callback - to add
      Returns:
      current controller

    • addEntitySaveCallback

      public EntityPropertiesBinderController addEntitySaveCallback(Runnable... callback)
      Add one or more callbacks that should be called whenever the entity save should happen. These will get executed in their registration order, after EntityPropertyController.BEFORE_ENTITY, but before EntityPropertyController.AFTER_ENTITY.
      Parameters:
      callback - to add
      Returns:
      current controller

    • applyValuesAndValidate

      public boolean applyValuesAndValidate(@NonNull @NonNull org.springframework.validation.Errors errors, Object... validationHints)
      First apply the values that have been registered on the binder, and then validate them. Combines in sequence applyValues() and validate(Errors, Object...).
      Parameters:
      errors - to register validation errors
      validationHints - optional validation hints (eg. validation groups)
      Returns:
      true if validation was successful, no validation errors have been added

    • applyValues

      public void applyValues()
      Apply the values of the properties present on the binder. This will call EntityPropertyController.applyValue(EntityPropertyBindingContext, EntityPropertyValue) for all those properties.

    • validate

      public boolean validate(@NonNull @NonNull org.springframework.validation.Errors errors, Object... validationHints)
      Validate the properties that are present on the binder, executing the registered callbacks when the actual entity validation is expected to happen. Note that performing validation usually required that applyValues() has been called (as value changes might not yet have been applied upwards otherwise).

      Validation is considered successful (returns true) if no additional errors have been added and the count at the start of the method is the same as at the end.

      Parameters:
      errors - to register validation errors
      validationHints - optional validation hints (eg. validation groups)
      Returns:
      true if validation was successful, no validation errors have been added

    • save

      public void save()
      Save the properties present on the binder, executing the registered callbacks when the actual entity is expected to be saved.
